mapper.insert:
REPLACE INTO fund_detail ( id, fund_code, fund_name, fund_type, company_code, company_name, one_n, six_y, three_y, one_y ) VALUES
(#{fundDetail.id}, #{fundDetail.fundCode}, #{fundDetail.fundName}, #{fundDetail.fundType}, #{fundDetail.companyCode}, #{fundDetail.companyName}, #{fundDetail.oneN}, #{fundDetail.sixY},#{fundDetail.threeY}, #{fundDetail.oneY})
